subject: Golf
British Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: The local caddie Andy Sutton helped Ben Curtis win the Open the last time it was played at Royal St. George’s. But this year, Sutton will be caddying for another player.
snippet: The local caddie Andy Sutton helped Ben Curtis win the Open the last time it was played at Royal St. George’s. But this year, Sutton will be caddying for another player.
